description.value:
Thin, shiny wires crisscross the surface of this smooth, black wand. The pommel is capped with a polished metal sphere, which sometimes emits small electric sparks.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day, plus overcharge

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Blur], and the wand creates faint orbs of electricity @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] in the haze around you. Each time a creature that's adjacent to you fails a flat check against the concealment from blur, they explode one of the orbs, causing them to take @Damage[5[electricity]] damage.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of blur.
